Files Headings

unzipWith.js

 
var arrayMap = require('../internal/arrayMap'),
    arrayReduce = require('../internal/arrayReduce'),
    bindCallback = require('../internal/bindCallback'),
    unzip = require('./unzip');

This method is like _.unzip except that it accepts an iteratee to specify how regrouped values should be combined. The iteratee is bound to thisArg and invoked with four arguments: (accumulator, value, index, group).

Params
array Array The array of grouped elements to process.
[iteratee] Function The function to combine regrouped values.
[thisArg] The this binding of iteratee. 
function unzipWith(array, iteratee, thisArg) {
  var length = array ? array.length : 0;
  if (!length) {
    return [];
  }
  var result = unzip(array);
  if (iteratee == null) {
    return result;
  }
  iteratee = bindCallback(iteratee, thisArg, 4);
  return arrayMap(result, function(group) {
    return arrayReduce(group, iteratee, undefined, true);
  });
}

module.exports = unzipWith;
